text: Backlash (2007) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE). It took place on April 29, 2007 at the Philips Arena in Atlanta, Georgia. It was the ninth Backlash event held by WWE and the first to also feature the ECW brand. ==Matches== No. Matches Stipulations Times 1 Carlito defeated Johnny Nitro Singles match 6:21 2 The Hardys (Matt and Jeff Hardy) (c) defeated Lance Cade and Trevor Murdoch Tag team match for the World Tag Team Championship 15:18 3 Melina (c) defeated Mickie James Singles match for the WWE Women's Championship 9:02 4 Chris Benoit (c) defeated Montel Vontavious Porter Singles match for the WWE United States Championship 13:10 5 Umaga, Mr. McMahon, and Shane McMahon defeated Bobby Lashley (c) Handicap match for the ECW World Championship 15:45 6 The Undertaker (c) vs. Batista ended in a draw Last Man Standing match for the World Heavyweight Championship 20:23 7 John Cena (c) defeated Edge, Randy Orton and Shawn Michaels Fatal four-way match for the WWE Championship 19:21 ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Backlash 2007 website Category:2007 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in Atlanta Category:WWE Backlash Category:2000s in Atlanta, Georgia Category:2007 in Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Backlash (2007)
